alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:55PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Idaho and southern Clearwater Counties through 945 PM PDT... At 853 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Lowell, or 16 miles southeast of Kamiah, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Brief heavy rain, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lowell and Syringa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
